message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to find a price closer to $75 if possible.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $75 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $80 for the product.
I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still looking for a bit more value. I can offer it to you for $82.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $81 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still looking for a bit more value. I can offer it to you for $83.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $82.5 for the product.
I'm willing to consider your offer, Bob, but I'm still looking for a bit more value. I can offer it to you for $84.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the negotiations, I am willing to pay $83.5 for the product.
